attributes.action:
All  state schools to be closed but working remotely.
From Friday 11th December
attributes.additional_details:
safer Christmas 
Excess usage And over crowding on public transport
Reduce the spread of Covid
So we can be in line with Universities and the private schools
Avoid isolating in the run up to Christmas
attributes.background: Close schools but work remotely. For one week prior to Christmas hols

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549015
